description: As anglers, we see firsthand the dramatic effects of climate change on their fisheries and ultimately their planet. We must protect their home waters and using resOurces wisely is a start. By utilizing fabric scraps and recycled bottles, this 100% recycled T-shirt reduces their reliance on virgin materials. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Home Water Trout Responsibili-Tee LS - Mens
